name: 6F - COVID Game
description:
if needed you can check more information here (Comp231-S3G5/Release-Plan (github.com))

Run your everyday errands while avoid the COVID and learn the best practices for Social Distancing, using sanitizer and masks to keep you safe.

Controls:

  • WASD or Arrows to move left and right;
  • Space to jump
  • Left Shift to Run
  • E to equip/unequip the mask
  • F to enter/leave places at their door
  • G to interact where possible.
  • I to open Inventory
  • O to open Options
  • Q to use sanitizer if player is infected into level 1
